title: When Raining Dua
description: Authentic supplications for When Raining Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for When Raining Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 172
items.translation: O Allah, may it be a beneficial rain cloud.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء المطر
